description: Trailblaze your trail days with the new Superior 5. It’s light, it’s fast, and it’s trail-running-ready with a MaxTrac™ outsole and a multi-directional lug pattern for traction on any terrain. The updated removeable StoneGuard™ uses less material and is lighter weight and the “burrito” style wrap-around tongue provides a locked-in feel. Lace up and take off with the Superior 5.
name: Altra Superior 5 - Mens
